result: Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Join us at SHOJEBthings in Gazipur, Bangladesh as we work towards empowering the underprivileged with technology. You can reach us at shojeb.ruetete18@gmail.com or visit our website for more information.
Shojeb is the founder of SHOJEBthings, a company in its early stages.
Join SHOJEBthings to empower the underprivileged and bring change through technology in Gazipur, Bangladesh. (Email: shojeb.ruetete18@gmail.com, Website: SHOJEBthings Website)
